title: Shinigami in League?
body:
I'm farming lane minding my own business, I see this icon pop up over my head, wasn't sure what it meant so I cowered under turret.

Next thing I know my champion has a heart attack or stroke, then I see a freaking lion running away from my corpse!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=GOF GOLDEN,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=26cELOdd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-17T01:47:20.396+0000)
>
> bs

It just happened in my last game. I checked the boards and youtube to see if anybody else ever experienced this. Apparently there is a common glitch in game that allows a beastly catman to pop up next to you old school Talon style and massacre you faster than season 3 Kassadin.
Not sure if shitpost.. Kindred hunt icon?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=26cELOdd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-17T01:39:15.992+0000)
>
> Not sure if shitpost.. Kindred hunt icon?

Kindred the lion?
